title: Why I’m proud to be a very un-pushy parent, just like Bradley Wiggins
text:
My 13-year-old son is very good at football. According to his team manager he’s the shining light on his team; always running, hustling, working defenders and making life difficult for the opposition. Standing on the sidelines on a soggy Sunday afternoon, myself and the rest of the supporting parents are often left slack-jawed by some of his high jinks and skills, jostling past players twice his size, creating chances out of nowhere and burying balls time and time again into the corner of the net.

He was scouted by a Premier League football club's academy when he was seven, didn’t quite make it through the rounds but was encouraged to try again when he was a year or so older.

We never did, the...
description: My 13-year-old son is very good at football.
